entry.title: WIND WARNING , Hendrickson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hendrickson Creek 04:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 48 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -10.9°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this morning. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas late this morning and this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow near the British Columbia border. Amount 5 cm near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023
